  • Design and develop innovative features for our decentralized trading platform, ensuring high performance, security, and user-friendliness.

  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code in TypeScript, Python, and other relevant languages.

about_company:
About Wintermute

Wintermute is building the future of finance through a decentralized trading platform designed to revolutionize the DeFi user experience. We believe DeFi empowers true innovation, economic freedom, and the creation of superior financial products.

Driven by a user-centric approach, Wintermute is committed to developing high-performance trading tools with efficient execution that are accessible to everyone. selection_process:
Wintermute Senior Developer Hiring Workflow

1. Application Review: Candidates submit their resumes and cover letters through the job portal. The AI agent automatically screens applications based on keywords, skills, and experience matching the job description.

2. Technical Assessment: Shortlisted candidates complete a technical assessment testing their coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and understanding of relevant technologies (TypeScript, Python, Rust, web3 tools).

3. Culture Fit Interview: Candidates participate in a video interview with a member of the Wintermute team to assess their cultural fit, communication style, and passion for decentralized finance.

4. Technical Interview: Candidates engage in a technical interview with senior developers, delving deeper into their technical expertise, project experience, and approach to problem-solving.

5. Final Round Interview: Top candidates participate in a final round interview with the hiring manager and potentially other team members, discussing their career goals, contributions to the team, and alignment with Wintermute's vision.

6. Decision & Offer: The hiring team reviews all interview feedback and makes a final decision. The selected candidate receives a job offer outlining compensation, benefits, and start date.

Sumo Digital, Sheffield

key_responsibility:

selection_process:

job_description:
Application Engineer (Product Logic & State Orchestration Engineer)

LaunchBrightly

About LaunchBrightly:

LaunchBrightly is a remote-first startup founded in 2022, backed by prominent venture firms. We are building the next generation of B2B web applications, focused on delivering exceptional user experiences and empowering businesses to thrive.

Job Description:

We are seeking a talented Application Engineer to join our growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for building the core logic layer of our product, including workflows, task runners, state machines, rules engines, and orchestration. You will work closely with the team to design and implement robust data schemas for DynamoDB and GraphQL queries, leveraging a Serverless architecture with AWS Amplify.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement the product's logic layer, ensuring scalability, reliability, and maintainability.
  • Model data schemas for DynamoDB and GraphQL queries, optimizing for performance and efficiency.
  • Develop and maintain Serverless functions using AWS Lambda, integrating event-driven flows and task orchestration.
  • Write clean, deterministic, testable, and observable code in TypeScript and JavaScript.
  • Collaborate with the team to ensure alignment with product vision and technical best practices.

Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of industry experience building production-grade B2B web applications.
  • Strong understanding of TypeScript, JavaScript, and modern frontend architecture (Vue 3 SPA).
  • Experience with AWS Lambda functions, DynamoDB, and GraphQL queries.
  • Familiarity with UI-layer concepts (HTML, DOM, TailwindCSS, HeadlessUI).
  • Excellent communication and documentation skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple contexts and prioritize effectively.

Benefits:

  • Remote-first work environment with flexible hours and locations.
  • Culture of NO meetings, prioritizing maker time and productivity.
  • True ownership and autonomy over your role and impact on the company.
  • Experienced founders with a proven track record of building successful products.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and Develop Product Logic: Collaborate with the team to architect and implement the core logic powering LaunchBrightly's product, encompassing workflows, task runners, state machines, rules engines, and orchestration systems.
  • Data Modeling and Management: Design robust and scalable data schemas for DynamoDB and define efficient GraphQL queries to ensure seamless data access and retrieval.
  • Serverless Architecture Implementation: Leverage AWS Amplify to build and maintain a robust serverless architecture, focusing on event-driven flows and efficient task orchestration.
  • Code Quality and Maintainability: Write clean, deterministic, and highly testable code in TypeScript and JavaScript, adhering to best practices for observability and maintainability.
  • Collaboration and Communication: Actively participate in team discussions, provide clear documentation, and effectively communicate technical concepts to stakeholders.

3. Interview Rounds:

  • Technical Interview: Dives deeper into technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and experience with relevant technologies.

4. Final Decision:

selection_process:

1. Application Review:

Interested candidates submit their applications through the TELUS Digital AI Community platform. Applications are screened for basic eligibility based on required skills and experience.

Shortlisted candidates complete a brief online assessment testing their English communication skills, knowledge of US culture and current affairs, and familiarity with web browsing and navigation.

3. Qualification Process:

Candidates who successfully complete the online assessment are invited to participate in a standard qualification process. This may include tasks simulating the role's responsibilities, such as analyzing and rating search results.

Upon successful completion of the qualification process, candidates undergo ID verification and a language proficiency test to ensure they meet the required standards.

selection_process:
CoinGecko Senior Product Manager Data Selection Process

1. Application Review: Candidates will be screened based on their resume and cover letter, focusing on relevant experience, skills, and alignment with the job description.

2. Phone Screening: Shortlisted candidates will participate in a 30-minute phone interview with a recruiter to assess their communication skills, motivation, and basic understanding of the role.

3. Technical Assessment: Candidates will complete a technical assessment evaluating their product management knowledge, data analysis skills, and problem-solving abilities.

4. Virtual Interviews: Top performers will participate in two virtual interviews:

  • Behavioral Interview: Focuses on past experiences, leadership style, and cultural fit.
  • Product Case Study: Candidates will analyze a real-world product challenge and present their proposed solution.

5. Final Decision: The hiring team will review all interview feedback and assessment results to select the best candidate.

Throughout the process, CoinGecko prioritizes transparency and timely communication with all applicants.

job_description:
Svelte Developer - Green Stuff World

About Green Stuff World

Green Stuff World is a thriving, profitable online hobby shop with over 10 years of experience and a team of ~80 passionate individuals. We're experiencing rapid growth and are building a new, 100% remote engineering team to modernize our platform. Our backend is being rebuilt using C# on .NET 9, and we're leveraging TypeScript with the Svelte framework for fast, reliable, and scalable frontend experiences.

About You

We're seeking an experienced, full-time Frontend Software Engineer to join our growing team. You're passionate about designing and building user-facing features from the ground up, possess a strong understanding of modern web technologies, and thrive in a collaborative environment.

Requirements

  • 4+ years of experience building modern frontend applications with JavaScript, HTML, and Tailwind CSS.
  • 1+ year of experience working with Svelte.
  • Proven ability to debug, optimize performance, and write clean, maintainable code.
  • Strong UI design skills and a keen eye for detail.
  • Deep understanding of REST APIs and HTTP requests.
  • Experience participating in code reviews and maintaining scalable frontend architectures.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with native mobile app development (Kotlin).

Why Work With Us?

  • 100% remote work environment (we believe in trust and autonomy).
  • Flexible working hours.
  • 30 days of holiday - take them whenever you need.
  • No strict policies or hard deadlines.

Salary

We offer a competitive salary between $30,000 and $40,000 USD annually, depending on experience.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain user-facing features: Design, implement, and test new features and functionalities for our e-commerce platform using Svelte, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
  • Collaborate with the design team: Work closely with designers to translate UI/UX designs into functional and responsive web components.
  • Optimize performance and scalability: Ensure the frontend application is performant, responsive, and scalable to handle high traffic volumes.
  • Write clean, maintainable code: Adhere to coding best practices, write well-documented code, and participate in code reviews to maintain code quality.
  • Integrate with backend APIs: Consume and interact with REST APIs to fetch and display data from our C#/.NET backend.
  • Contribute to frontend architecture: Participate in discussions and contribute to the evolution of our frontend architecture to ensure maintainability and scalability.
  • Stay up-to-date with web technologies: Continuously learn and explore new technologies and frameworks to improve our frontend development practices.
about_company:
About Green Stuff World

Green Stuff World is a thriving, bootstrapped online hobby shop with over a decade of experience serving passionate hobbyists worldwide. We're a team of ~80 dedicated individuals committed to providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service.

Driven by continuous growth, we're investing in a cutting-edge technology platform. Our engineering team is building a modern, 100% remote environment, leveraging C# on .NET 9 for the backend and TypeScript with the Svelte framework for a fast, reliable, and scalable frontend experience.

Join our team and be a part of shaping the future of Green Stuff World!
selection_process:
Green Stuff World: Svelte Developer Selection Process

1. Application Review: Candidates submit their resume and cover letter through the job portal. The AI agent automatically screens applications based on keywords and required qualifications.

2. Technical Assessment: Shortlisted candidates complete a coding challenge focused on Svelte, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. This allows for a practical evaluation of their skills.

3. Video Interview: Top performers participate in a video interview with a member of the engineering team. This stage focuses on understanding their experience, problem-solving approach, and cultural fit.

4. Culture Fit Interview: Finalists engage in a second interview with a team lead or manager. This conversation delves deeper into their work style, communication preferences, and alignment with Green Stuff World's values.

5. Offer & Onboarding: Successful candidates receive a formal job offer outlining salary and benefits. Upon acceptance, a comprehensive onboarding process ensures a smooth transition into the team.

selection_process:
Aurora Labs Senior Software Engineer Hiring Workflow

Phase 1: Application Screening (AI-Powered)

  • Resume & Cover Letter Review: AI analyzes resumes for relevant keywords, experience, and skills matching the job description.

Phase 2: Technical Assessment (Human & AI Collaboration)

  • Coding Challenge: Candidates solve a technical problem related to blockchain development and full-stack engineering. AI evaluates code quality and efficiency.

job_description:
Senior Software Engineer - ModelVault

About ModelVault

ModelVault is revolutionizing AI accessibility by building the world's first fully-integrated, on-prem AI appliance. We're a remote-first, async-friendly team passionate about empowering individuals and organizations with secure, local AI solutions.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team. You will play a key role in designing and building the software layer for our on-prem AI appliance, enabling users to seamlessly deploy and manage AI models locally.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop local APIs, CLI tools, and an admin web UI for our on-prem AI appliance.
  • Integrate and manage containerized LLMs and vision models for local inference.
  • Collaborate with systems and hardware engineers to optimize performance and ensure seamless integration.
  • Participate in architectural discussions and gather feedback from early users to refine the product.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of software engineering experience, preferably in devtools, infrastructure, or platform teams.
  • Strong understanding of containerized environments (Docker, Compose, systemd).
  • Proficiency in Python, FastAPI, shell scripting, and React/Next.js.
  • Experience with GPU systems, Nvidia drivers, CUDA, or model performance tuning is a plus.

Benefits:

  • Be part of a cutting-edge team shaping the future of local AI.
  • Enjoy a remote-first, async-friendly work environment with high autonomy and ownership.
  • Contribute to a product that empowers individuals and organizations with secure and accessible AI solutions.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Software Architecture & Development: Design and implement the core software components for ModelVault's on-premise AI appliance, including APIs, command-line interfaces (CLIs), and an administrative web user interface (UI).
  • Model Integration & Management: Integrate and manage containerized large language models (LLMs) and vision models for local inference, ensuring seamless deployment and performance.
  • Performance Optimization: Collaborate with systems and hardware engineers to optimize the performance and efficiency of the software stack, leveraging GPU acceleration and other hardware capabilities.
  • User Feedback & Iteration: Engage with early users to gather feedback and iterate on the software design, ensuring it meets the needs of the target audience.
  • Technical Leadership: Contribute to architectural decisions and mentor junior engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and technical excellence.
about_company:
About ModelVault

ModelVault is revolutionizing the way individuals and organizations interact with artificial intelligence. We are building the world's first fully-integrated, on-premise AI appliance, empowering users to harness the power of AI securely and privately, without reliance on cloud services.

Our remote-first, async-friendly culture fosters a high degree of autonomy and ownership, allowing our team to make a real impact on the future of AI accessibility. We believe everyone deserves access to the transformative benefits of AI, and we're dedicated to making that a reality.
selection_process:

  • Technical Interview: A senior engineer evaluates technical expertise through a problem-solving discussion and code review.
  • Culture Fit Interview: The candidate meets with a team member to discuss work style, values, and team dynamics.

4. Decision & Offer: The hiring team reviews candidate performance across all stages. A final decision is made, and a competitive offer is extended to the selected candidate.

About ModelVault:

ModelVault is building the world's first plug-and-play on-premise AI server, empowering organizations to securely and efficiently deploy AI models on their own infrastructure. We are a fully remote, async-friendly team with a deeply product-focused founding culture built on trust and ownership.

Job Description:

We are seeking a passionate and experienced Founding Product Lead to spearhead the development of our v1 hardware + software platform. You will be instrumental in defining the product vision, scope, and roadmap, working closely with engineering to deliver a seamless user experience.

Responsibilities:

  • Define and execute the product strategy for ModelVault's on-premise AI server.
  • Develop and maintain a detailed product roadmap, prioritizing features and releases.
  • Conduct product discovery and market research to validate demand and refine positioning.
  • Collaborate closely with engineering to design, develop, and ship local model serving, fine-tuning workflows, and intuitive UI/CLI interfaces.
  • Oversee hardware + software integration and build systems to ensure scalability and reliability.
  • Represent product thinking in key decisions, ensuring alignment with the overall company strategy.

Qualifications:

  • 4-10 years of experience in product management, engineering, or technical founding.
  • Fluency in technical product development and a deep understanding of AI/ML concepts.
  • Proven ability to build and ship zero-to-one hardware/software products or complex technical stacks.
  • Strong bias for action, clarity, and data-driven decision making.
  • Exceptional communication, collaboration, and leadership skills.

Benefits:

  • Be part of a high-impact, early-stage startup with a mission to democratize AI.
  • Shape the future of on-premise AI and contribute to cutting-edge technology.
  • Enjoy a fully remote, async-friendly work environment with a strong focus on work-life balance.
  • Collaborate with a talented and passionate team of engineers and product experts.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Product Vision & Strategy: Define and articulate the product vision, scope, and roadmap for ModelVault's on-premise AI server, ensuring alignment with company goals and market needs.
  • Technical Execution: Lead the development of the v1 hardware and software platform, collaborating closely with engineering to deliver local model serving, fine-tuning workflows, and intuitive UI/CLI interfaces.

  • System Integration & Scalability: Oversee the integration of hardware and software components, establishing robust systems and processes to support future growth and scalability.
  • Decision Making & Communication: Represent product thinking in key strategic decisions, effectively communicating product vision and roadmap to stakeholders across the organization.
about_company:
About ModelVault

ModelVault is revolutionizing AI accessibility by building the world's first plug-and-play on-premise AI server. We empower organizations to harness the power of artificial intelligence without the complexities and risks of cloud-based solutions.

Our fully remote, async-friendly team fosters a deeply product-focused culture built on trust and ownership. We believe in empowering individuals to take initiative and drive impactful results. At ModelVault, we're not just building technology; we're building a future where AI is accessible to everyone.
selection_process:
ModelVault: Founding Product Lead Selection Process

Phase 1: Application Review (1 week)

  • AI-powered resume screening for technical skills and experience alignment.
  • Manual review by the hiring manager for cultural fit and leadership potential.

Phase 2: Initial Screening (1 week)

  • 30-minute phone call with the hiring manager to assess communication skills, product vision, and motivation.

Phase 3: Technical Assessment (1 week)

  • A take-home project simulating a real-world product challenge related to ModelVault's on-premise AI server.

Phase 4: Final Interviews (2 weeks)

  • Two 1-hour interviews with key stakeholders:
    • Product & Engineering Deep Dive: Exploring technical expertise, product strategy, and collaborative approach.
    • Culture & Leadership Fit: Assessing alignment with ModelVault's values, remote work style, and leadership expectations.

Phase 5: Decision & Offer (1 week)

  • Final candidate selection based on holistic evaluation of skills, experience, cultural fit, and project performance.
  • Offer extended with competitive compensation package.

job_description:
EMEA Solutions Engineer - PingCAP

About PingCAP

PingCAP is a global leader in the database market, offering TiDB Database and Database as a Service. As a major disruptor in the rapidly growing massive database market, PingCAP is poised for continued success.

Job Description

We are seeking a passionate and experienced EMEA Solutions Engineer to join our growing team. In this role, you will be the technical expert, educating customers on the capabilities and benefits of TiDB, guiding them through design, deployment, and optimization of their TiDB implementations. You will lead Proof of Concept (PoC) engagements, develop tailored architectural solutions, and provide technical input on RFPs and customer technical requirements.

Responsibilities:

  • Educate customers on TiDB's features and benefits through presentations, workshops, and technical documentation.
  • Guide customers through the design, deployment, and optimization of TiDB solutions.
  • Lead PoC engagements, demonstrating TiDB's capabilities and tailoring solutions to specific customer needs.
  • Provide technical expertise on RFPs and customer technical requirements.
  • Develop and deliver compelling technical content, presentations, and workshops.
  • Stay abreast of the latest trends and advancements in distributed database technology.
  • Collaborate with internal teams to improve TiDB products and positioning.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of experience in Solutions Engineering, Solutions Architecture, Database Administration, or Software Engineering.
  • Strong understanding of clustering technologies, Linux system administration, and network configuration.
  • Hands-on experience with relational and NoSQL databases.
  • Proficiency in at least one scripting language (e.g., Python, Golang, Shell scripting).
  • Exceptional communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and a passion for customer success.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Technical Expertise: Provide in-depth technical guidance to EMEA customers on PingCAP's TiDB database, encompassing its capabilities, benefits, and best practices.
  • Solution Design & Implementation: Collaborate with customers to design, deploy, and optimize TiDB solutions tailored to their specific needs and business requirements.
  • Proof of Concept (PoC) Leadership: Lead PoC engagements, demonstrating TiDB's value proposition and showcasing its capabilities in real-world scenarios.
  • Technical Sales Support: Provide technical expertise to the sales team, contributing to RFP responses, addressing customer technical inquiries, and developing compelling technical presentations.
  • Knowledge Sharing & Advocacy: Develop and deliver technical content, presentations, and workshops to educate customers and partners about TiDB. Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in distributed database technology.
  • Customer Success: Act as a trusted advisor to customers, ensuring their successful adoption and utilization of TiDB, and fostering long-term relationships.
about_company:
About PingCAP

PingCAP is a global leader in the database market, revolutionizing how businesses manage and leverage their data. We offer TiDB, a next-generation distributed database that combines the scalability and availability of NoSQL with the ACID guarantees and SQL compatibility of traditional relational databases.

PingCAP's mission is to empower organizations with a database that can handle the demands of modern applications, from high-volume transactional workloads to complex analytical queries. Our innovative technology and commitment to customer success have positioned us as a major disruptor in the rapidly growing database market, which is projected to exceed $119 billion by 2025.

Customer Support Operations Lead

About HappyCo

HappyCo is a leading PropTech company founded in 2011, building mobile and cloud solutions for real-time property data. With over 5 million units on our platform, we're revolutionizing the real estate industry. We offer a flexible, supportive culture and competitive compensation, including stock options, unlimited vacation time, generous paid parental leave, and monthly stipends for wellness and home office expenses.

Job Description

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Customer Support Operations Lead (CSOL) to join our growing team. As CSOL, you will play a critical role in optimizing our customer support operations and ensuring exceptional customer experiences.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the operationalization of a BPO support partner within 12 weeks.
  • Develop and implement a scalable escalation model to improve customer issue resolution.
  • Optimize workflows across Zendesk, Jira, Slack, and Gainsight.
  • Streamline support processes to reduce response and resolution times.
  • Establish structured reporting and feedback systems.
  • Own internal knowledge management and enablement resources.

  • 3-5+ years of experience in Support Operations, Customer Experience, or related SaaS roles.
  • Proven success onboarding and scaling BPO support teams.
  • Experience administering Zendesk and knowledge of Jira, Gainsight, and Slack workflows.
  • Strong communication, project management, and analytical skills.

If you are passionate about delivering exceptional customer experiences and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply!

  • Workflow Optimization: Analyze and optimize support workflows across Zendesk, Jira, Slack, and Gainsight to enhance efficiency, collaboration, and issue resolution.
  • Process Improvement: Streamline support processes to reduce response and resolution times, leveraging data and insights to identify areas for improvement.
  • Reporting & Feedback: Establish structured reporting systems to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide actionable insights for continuous process optimization. Develop feedback mechanisms to gather customer and agent perspectives for ongoing improvement.

Growth Marketer

About Arbitrum Foundation

The Arbitrum Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to scaling Ethereum through innovative Layer 2 solutions. As the leading Ethereum scaling solution with hundreds of dApps and over $13 billion in Total Value Locked (TVL), Arbitrum is committed to decentralization, innovation, and community.

Job Description

We are seeking a passionate and experienced Growth Marketer to join our team and drive the growth of DeFi projects launching on Arbitrum.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute growth strategies for DeFi projects on Arbitrum, leveraging both Web2 and Web3 marketing techniques.
  • Lead the conceptualization and implementation of Web3 incentive growth campaigns.
  • Collaborate closely with community, partnership, and product marketing teams to ensure seamless campaign execution.
  • Maintain open communication with external stakeholders, contributing to their go-to-market (GTM) plans.
  • Establish best practices and scalable growth programs to achieve impactful results.

Qualifications:

  • 2+ years of experience in growth management or marketing, ideally within the Web2 and Web3 ecosystems.
  • Deep understanding of the DeFi and Web3 landscape.
  • Proven ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
  • Excellent relationship-building and communication skills.
  • Experience in community building and engagement.
  • Strong go-to-market strategy development skills.

Benefits:

We offer a comprehensive compensation package with remote work options, industry-leading healthcare insurance, a home office set-up allowance, a wellbeing allowance, a growth/continuing education allowance, flexible time off, and a company-issued laptop.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

Growth Strategy & Execution:

  • Develop and implement data-driven growth strategies for DeFi projects launching on Arbitrum, leveraging both Web2 and Web3 marketing tactics.
  • Conceptualize and lead innovative Web3 incentive programs to drive user acquisition and engagement.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with community, partnership, and product marketing teams to execute comprehensive marketing campaigns.

Stakeholder Management & Communication:

  • Build and maintain strong relationships with external stakeholders, including DeFi projects and developers.
  • Actively contribute to the development and execution of their go-to-market (GTM) strategies.
  • Ensure clear and consistent communication regarding Arbitrum's value proposition and growth initiatives.

Program Development & Optimization:

  • Establish best practices and scalable growth programs to maximize impact and drive sustainable user growth.
  • Analyze campaign performance data, identify areas for improvement, and iterate on strategies to optimize results.
  • Stay abreast of emerging trends and technologies in the DeFi and Web3 space to inform growth initiatives.
about_company:
About Arbitrum Foundation

Arbitrum Foundation is a non-profit organization driving the future of Ethereum scaling. Dedicated to making decentralized finance (DeFi) accessible to everyone, Arbitrum Foundation develops and supports Arbitrum, the leading Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum.

With hundreds of decentralized applications (dApps) and over $13 billion in total value locked (TVL), Arbitrum empowers developers to build innovative and performant applications while providing users with a seamless and cost-effective experience.

Driven by a commitment to decentralization, innovation, and community, Arbitrum Foundation fosters a collaborative ecosystem where developers, users, and stakeholders work together to shape the future of Web3.

1. Application Review: Qualified candidates will be shortlisted based on their resume and cover letter, focusing on relevant experience in growth marketing, Web2/Web3 expertise, and DeFi knowledge.

2. Initial Screening: Shortlisted candidates will participate in a 30-minute phone interview with a member of the team to assess their communication skills, understanding of the role, and enthusiasm for Arbitrum's mission.

3. Technical Assessment: Candidates who successfully complete the initial screening will be invited to complete a technical assessment focused on data analysis, campaign strategy development, and understanding of Web3 marketing techniques.

4. Final Interview: Top candidates will participate in a final interview with the hiring manager and other team members. This interview will delve deeper into their experience, approach to growth marketing, and cultural fit within Arbitrum Foundation.

5. Decision & Offer: The hiring team will review all interview feedback and technical assessment results to make a final decision. The selected candidate will receive a formal offer outlining compensation and benefits.

TrueML

About TrueML:

job_description:
Senior Scientific Software Engineer - Magnet Protection Systems

About Commonwealth Fusion Systems (CFS)

Commonwealth Fusion Systems is a leading fusion energy company dedicated to delivering commercially viable fusion power plants. Backed by over $2 billion in capital, CFS is building a diverse and dynamic team to accelerate the world's transition to clean energy.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented and motivated Senior Scientific Software Engineer to join our Magnet Protection Systems team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in developing software for a fiber optic quench detection system, a critical component of our fusion power plant.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement software algorithms for a fiber optic quench detection system.
  • Design and analyze algorithms to detect quenches based on real-time data from the fiber optic system.
  • Validate the fiber model and test the quench detection algorithm using experimental data.
  • Enhance algorithm performance through the application of image and signal processing techniques.
  • Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to identify and address data and algorithm needs.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a technical field (preferred).
  • Strong proficiency in Python, including type hinting and object-oriented programming.
  • Foundational understanding of numerical methods, linear algebra, and differential equations.
  • Experience with data analysis using pandas, numpy, and matplotlib.
  • Familiarity with signal processing, machine learning, or data analytic tools.
  • Bonus points for experience with C++, Rust, concurrency, and parallelization.

Compensation:

  • Competitive salary range: $140,000 - $200,000 per year (dependent on level, location, qualifications, and experience).
  • Comprehensive benefits package including equity, 12.5 company-wide holidays, flexible vacation days, and generous parental leave policy.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain software for a fiber optic quench detection system integrated into a fusion power plant.
  • Design and implement algorithms to identify quenches based on real-time data acquired from the fiber optic network.
  • Analyze experimental data to validate the fiber optic model and rigorously test the quench detection algorithm's accuracy and reliability.
  • Optimize algorithm performance by leveraging advanced image and signal processing techniques.
  • Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including engineers, physicists, and data scientists, to define and address critical data and algorithm requirements.
  • Contribute to the development and documentation of software design specifications, testing procedures, and user manuals.
about_company:
About Commonwealth Fusion Systems

Commonwealth Fusion Systems (CFS) is a leading fusion energy company on a mission to deliver commercially viable fusion power plants. Backed by over $2 billion in capital since 2018, CFS is pioneering a revolutionary approach to fusion energy, leveraging advanced superconducting magnets and innovative engineering to achieve net energy gain.

Driven by a team of world-class scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs, CFS is committed to creating a fast-paced and dynamic work environment that values diversity and fosters innovation. We believe that fusion energy holds the key to a sustainable future, and we are dedicated to making this vision a reality.

About Temporal

Temporal is revolutionizing software development with its open-source programming model. We empower developers to build more reliable, scalable, and maintainable applications by simplifying complex workflows. Temporal's intuitive design allows developers to focus on delivering features faster, while our vibrant community fosters continuous improvement through real-time feedback and contributions.

Driven by a passion for innovation and collaboration, Temporal is committed to providing developers with the tools they need to build the future of software. Join our team and be a part of shaping the next generation of application development.
selection_process:
Temporal Hiring Workflow: Senior Software Engineer Open Source Server

1. Application Review: Candidates submit resumes and cover letters outlining their experience with open-source software development, distributed systems, and relevant programming languages.

2. Technical Screening: Shortlisted candidates participate in a technical phone interview assessing their coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and understanding of Temporal's core concepts.

3. Take-Home Challenge: Top candidates complete a coding challenge designed to evaluate their ability to implement a specific Temporal feature or solve a real-world problem.

4. In-Depth Interview: Finalists engage in a comprehensive interview with the engineering team, discussing their technical expertise, experience with open-source contributions, and alignment with Temporal's mission.

5. Culture Fit Assessment: Candidates participate in a conversation focusing on their work style, communication preferences, and values to ensure a strong cultural fit within the team.

6. Offer & Onboarding: Selected candidates receive a formal offer and embark on a structured onboarding process to integrate seamlessly into the Temporal team.

job_description:
Golang Engineer - Remote

About Unikraft

Unikraft is a fast-growing startup revolutionizing the cloud computing landscape. We believe cloud platforms, while powerful, are built on outdated software, leading to inefficiency and high costs. Leveraging award-winning research and open-source technology, we are building a next-generation cloud platform that is both efficient and cost-effective.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented and passionate Golang Engineer to join our growing team. You will play a key role in developing and maintaining our core platform, contributing to a project that has the potential to reshape the future of cloud computing.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, scalable Golang applications.
  • Collaborate with a team of engineers to build and improve our cloud platform.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.

Qualifications

  • Strong proficiency in Golang programming language.
  • Experience building and deploying cloud-native applications.
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

Software Development:

  • Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, scalable Golang applications for Unikraft's cloud computing platform.
  • Write clean, well-documented, and testable code adhering to best practices and coding standards.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, design, QA) to ensure seamless integration and delivery of features.

System Architecture:

  • Contribute to the evolution of Unikraft's system architecture, proposing and implementing innovative solutions.
  • Analyze system performance and identify areas for optimization.
  • Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends in cloud computing and Golang development.

Open Source Contribution:

  • Actively participate in the Unikraft open-source community, contributing code, documentation, and bug fixes.
  • Engage with the wider Golang community, sharing knowledge and collaborating on projects.
about_company:
About Unikraft

Unikraft is a fast-growing startup revolutionizing the cloud computing landscape. We believe that while existing cloud platforms offer functionality and power, their reliance on legacy software creates inefficiencies and unnecessary costs.

Driven by award-winning research and open-source principles, Unikraft is building a next-generation cloud platform that is lean, efficient, and customizable. Our team of passionate engineers is dedicated to creating a more accessible and affordable cloud experience for everyone. Join us as we reshape the future of cloud computing!
selection_process:
Unikraft Golang Engineer Hiring Workflow

1. Application Review: Candidates submit resumes and cover letters through the job portal. The AI agent automatically screens applications based on keywords, experience, and qualifications.

2. Technical Assessment: Shortlisted candidates complete a coding challenge focused on Golang skills, testing their problem-solving abilities and proficiency.

3. Video Interview: Top performers participate in a video interview with a Unikraft engineer, discussing their experience, technical knowledge, and cultural fit.

4. Culture Fit Interview: Finalists engage in a conversation with a member of the Unikraft team to assess their alignment with the company's values and work environment.

5. Offer & Onboarding: Successful candidates receive a job offer and begin the onboarding process, joining a dynamic team at the forefront of cloud computing innovation.

qualification:
Qualifications

Required:

  • 5+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying production-grade backend systems using Python.
  • Strong understanding of concurrency and high-performance programming concepts, including asyncio, multiprocessing, and profiling techniques.
  • Proficiency in FastAPI and asyncio for building efficient and scalable APIs.
  • Experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS EKS + Fargate) and infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform).
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions) and best practices for continuous delivery.
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus/Grafana) and understanding of SLOs.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
  • Ability to work effectively in a remote, collaborative environment.
  • Time zone overlap within CET ± 2 hours.

Preferred:

  • Experience with audio/video streaming technologies (WebRTC, WebSockets).
  • Familiarity with Text-to-Speech (TTS) engines and technologies.
  • Experience working with Large Language Models (LLMs), PyTorch, Transformers, or ONNX Runtime.
  • Knowledge of Rust or Go for high-performance applications.
  • Experience leading end-to-end features in fast-paced environments.
job_description:
Senior Python Backend Engineer

About Orga AI

Orga AI, headquartered in Palma de Mallorca, develops real-time AI systems that see, listen, and speak. Our mission is to enable natural human-technology interaction through the power of multimodality.

Responsibilities

  • Design and optimize Python 3.11 / FastAPI / asyncio-based APIs and microservices powering our SDK and TTS engine.
  • Integrate and scale audio-video components (WebRTC, WebSockets) to maintain latency below 300ms.
  • Implement secure and scalable architectures in AWS EKS + Fargate, utilizing IaC (Terraform) and CI/CD (GitHub Actions).
  • Ensure observability with Prometheus/Grafana and maintain defined SLOs.
  • Collaborate with the MERN and DevOps teams for efficient continuous deployments.
  • Mentor junior team members and participate in code reviews, emphasizing best practices.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience building production-grade backends with Python.
  • Expertise in concurrency and high-performance systems (asyncio, multiprocessing, profiling).
  • Professional English proficiency and time zone overlap within CET ± 2 hours.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with audio/video streaming or TTS.
  • Work with LLMs, PyTorch, Transformers, or ONNX Runtime.
  • Knowledge of Rust or Go for high-performance paths.
  • Experience leading end-to-end features in fast-paced environments.

What We Offer

  • 100% remote contract with a flexible schedule focused on outcomes.
  • Multidisciplinary team and a culture of continuous feedback.

Selection Process

  • Interview (40 min)
  • Technical Deep-Dive (90 min) - Pairing with the CTO
  • Cultural Fit & Roadmap (45 min) - Chat with the CEO and Co-CEO

All steps are completed within approximately 7 days from the initial interview.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Design and Develop: Architect, design, and develop robust and scalable Python 3.11 APIs and microservices using FastAPI and asyncio, powering our SDK and TTS engine.
  • Integrate and Optimize: Seamlessly integrate and optimize audio-video components (WebRTC, WebSockets) to ensure real-time performance with latency below 300ms.
  • Infrastructure Management: Implement and maintain secure and scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS EKS + Fargate, leveraging IaC (Terraform) and CI/CD (GitHub Actions) pipelines.
  • Monitoring and Performance: Ensure system observability through Prometheus/Grafana monitoring, actively maintaining defined SLOs and identifying performance bottlenecks.
  • Collaboration and Mentorship: Collaborate effectively with MERN and DevOps teams to facilitate smooth continuous deployments. Mentor junior team members and actively participate in code reviews, promoting best practices.
about_company:
About Orga AI

Orga AI, headquartered in Palma de Mallorca, is a cutting-edge startup revolutionizing human-technology interaction. We develop real-time AI systems that "see, listen, and speak," enabling seamless and natural communication through multimodality.

Founded by a young visionary entrepreneur and a seasoned industry veteran, Orga AI boasts a diverse international team of 18 members. Backed by both public and private funding, we are recognized as one of Spain's top 100 startups by El Referente and are part of the prestigious Santander X100 program.

Driven by a mission to empower people through fluid and intuitive AI experiences, Orga AI is at the forefront of developing innovative solutions that shape the future of technology.
selection_process:
Orga AI Senior Python Backend Engineer Selection Process

Orga AI is seeking a talented Senior Python Backend Engineer to join our growing team.

Here's what you can expect:

  1. Initial Interview (40 min): Get to know the Orga AI team and share your background and experience. This is a chance to learn more about the role and company culture.

  2. Technical Deep Dive (90 min): Pair with our CTO for a hands-on technical assessment, showcasing your Python skills, problem-solving abilities, and understanding of backend systems.

  3. Cultural Fit & Roadmap (45 min): Engage in a conversation with the CEO and Co-CEO to discuss your motivations, work style, and how your skills align with Orga AI's vision and roadmap.

Timeline:

The entire selection process is designed to be efficient and transparent, typically completed within 7 days from your initial interview.

We look forward to meeting you!

job_description:
Go Developer Consultant

About GoDevs

GoDevs.com is a talent marketplace connecting skilled Go developers with companies seeking exceptional backend engineering expertise. We specialize in remote, Go-focused development roles across various industries, from startups to established enterprises.

Job Description

We are seeking experienced Go Developer Consultants to join our growing network. As a consultant, you will leverage your expertise to deliver high-quality solutions for our diverse clientele. You will work remotely on a project basis, collaborating with clients to understand their needs and deliver tailored Go-based solutions.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement robust Go applications.
  • Collaborate with clients to define project scope and requirements.
  • Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.

Qualifications:

  • Proven experience developing with Go (Golang).
  • Strong understanding of backend development principles.
  • Experience with relevant frameworks and libraries (e.g., Gin, Echo, gRPC).
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.

about_company:
About GoDevs

GoDevs is a leading talent marketplace connecting exceptional Go developers with companies seeking top-tier backend engineering expertise. We specialize in remote, Go-focused development roles, catering to both dynamic startups and established enterprises.

At GoDevs, we understand the unique demands of Go development and are committed to fostering a community of skilled professionals. Our platform provides a curated network of experienced Go developers, ensuring our clients access the best talent for their projects. We prioritize transparency, communication, and a seamless experience for both developers and clients, making GoDevs the go-to destination for all your Go development needs.
selection_process:
GoDevs Hiring Workflow for Go Developer Consultants

1. Application Review: Candidates submit their resume and cover letter through the GoDevs portal. The AI-powered system automatically screens for relevant skills and experience based on the job description.

2. Skills Assessment: Shortlisted candidates complete a technical assessment testing their Go programming knowledge and problem-solving abilities.

3. Video Interview: Top performers participate in a video interview with a GoDevs recruiter to discuss their experience, project portfolio, and career goals.

4. Client Interview: Successful candidates are presented to relevant clients for a final interview. This allows for a direct connection and assessment of cultural fit.

5. Onboarding: Selected candidates receive a comprehensive onboarding process, including project introductions, team introductions, and GoDevs platform training.

This streamlined workflow ensures a quick and efficient selection process, connecting talented Go developers with exciting remote opportunities.

job_description:
VP/Associate, Talent Acquisition

Hex Trust

About Hex Trust:

Hex Trust is a fully regulated institutional digital asset Custody, Staking, and Markets services provider with a global presence. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace that fosters personal and professional growth.

Job Summary:

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced VP/Associate, Talent Acquisition to lead our global talent acquisition strategy. You will be responsible for developing and executing innovative recruitment initiatives, driving senior and executive-level hiring, and ensuring a world-class candidate experience.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement a comprehensive global talent acquisition strategy aligned with business objectives.
  • Lead the full-cycle recruitment process for senior and executive-level positions, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding.
  • Own and optimize the end-to-end recruitment process, leveraging data and analytics to measure effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.
  • Oversee the utilization of recruitment technologies, including our ATS platform, Workable.
  • Act as a trusted advisor to the Executive Team and hiring managers, providing expert guidance on talent acquisition best practices.

Qualifications:

  • 3-8+ years of proven experience in talent acquisition within the Fintech and Crypto industry.
  • Demonstrated success in placing both technical and non-technical candidates at all levels.
  • Strong executive presence and ability to influence senior stakeholders.
  • Deep understanding of sourcing techniques, recruitment marketing, and employer branding strategies.
  • Experience with applicant tracking systems (ATS) and recruitment analytics tools.

Benefits:

Hex Trust offers a competitive compensation package, including a generous salary and bonus structure, comprehensive benefits, and ample opportunities for professional development.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

Talent Acquisition Strategy:

  • Develop and execute a comprehensive global talent acquisition strategy aligned with Hex Trust's business objectives and growth plans.
  • Identify key talent needs across all departments and levels, anticipating future hiring requirements.

Recruitment Execution:

  • Lead and manage the full-cycle recruitment process for a variety of roles, including senior and executive positions.
  • Partner with hiring managers to understand job requirements, develop compelling job descriptions, and establish clear hiring criteria.
  • Source, screen, and interview candidates, leveraging a variety of sourcing channels and techniques.
  • Manage the candidate experience, ensuring a positive and professional interaction throughout the recruitment process.

Team Management & Process Improvement:

  • Build and lead a high-performing talent acquisition team, fostering a collaborative and results-oriented environment.
  • Continuously evaluate and improve recruitment processes, implementing best practices and leveraging technology to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
  • Analyze recruitment data and metrics to identify trends, measure success, and inform strategic decision-making.
about_company:
About Hex Trust

Hex Trust is a leading, fully regulated institutional digital asset services provider, offering custody, staking, and markets solutions to a global clientele. With offices strategically located in Hong Kong, Singapore, Dubai, Italy, and Vietnam, Hex Trust is at the forefront of the digital asset revolution, empowering institutions to navigate the complexities of this rapidly evolving landscape.

Driven by a commitment to security, transparency, and innovation, Hex Trust fosters a supportive and inclusive environment that encourages personal and professional growth. They are dedicated to building a diverse and talented team that reflects the global nature of their business. Hex Trust believes in providing employees with competitive compensation, generous benefits, and ample opportunities for professional development.
selection_process:
Hex Trust VP Associate Talent Acquisition Selection Process

Hex Trust's selection process for the VP Associate Talent Acquisition role prioritizes identifying candidates with a proven track record in Fintech and Crypto talent acquisition.

Phase 1: Application & Screening

  • Candidates submit their resume and cover letter through the Workable ATS platform.
  • Initial screening focuses on relevant experience, skills, and qualifications outlined in the job description.

Phase 2: Phone Interview

  • Shortlisted candidates participate in a phone interview with a member of the Talent Acquisition team to assess communication skills, cultural fit, and initial understanding of the role.

Phase 3: Video Interview

  • Top candidates progress to a video interview with the hiring manager and potentially other senior stakeholders. This stage delves deeper into experience, leadership style, and strategic thinking.

Phase 4: Assessment & Reference Checks

  • Selected candidates complete a skills assessment relevant to talent acquisition and provide references for verification.

Phase 5: Final Interview & Offer

  • Finalists participate in a comprehensive interview with the Executive Team, focusing on strategic alignment and cultural fit.
  • Following successful completion of all stages, a formal offer is extended to the chosen candidate.

This structured process ensures a thorough evaluation of each candidate's suitability for the VP Associate Talent Acquisition role at Hex Trust.

qualification:
Qualifications

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Systems Engineer to join our growing Interop team.

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  • 5+ years of hands-on experience in software engineering, with a focus on building and maintaining large-scale distributed systems.
  • Strong proficiency in systems programming languages such as Rust or C++.
  • Demonstrated experience in secure systems design, including knowledge of cryptography and mitigation strategies against Denial-of-Service (DoS) attacks.
  • Deep understanding of networking concepts, distributed systems architectures, storage technologies, databases, operating systems, and runtimes.

  • Contributions to open-source projects.
job_description:
Systems Engineer (Interop Team)

About Mysten Labs

Mysten Labs is a remote-first company revolutionizing decentralized protocols with cutting-edge blockchain technology. Backed by a $300M Series B round from leading Silicon Valley venture funds, we're building the foundational infrastructure to bring the next billion users to Web3.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented and experienced Systems Engineer to join our growing Interop team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in designing and implementing large-scale distributed systems that power the future of decentralized applications.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement robust, scalable distributed systems.
  • Ensure the correctness and performance of developed components.
  • Contribute to secure system design, incorporating cryptography and DoS attack prevention strategies.
  • Participate actively in technical discussions and code reviews.
  • Translate research papers in networking, distributed systems, and storage into practical system designs.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of hands-on software engineering experience.
  • Proficiency in systems programming languages like Rust or C++.
  • Demonstrated experience in secure systems design and evaluation.
  • Strong understanding of networking, distributed systems, storage, databases, operating systems, and runtimes.
  • Excellent communication and documentation skills.

Benefits:

  • Be part of a dynamic and innovative team shaping the future of Web3.
  • Contribute to cutting-edge technology with global impact.
  • Enjoy a remote-first work environment with flexible hours.
  • Access to continuous learning and development opportunities.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

System Integration & Development:

  • Design and implement robust, scalable solutions for interoperability between different blockchain networks and protocols.
  • Develop and maintain integration tools and libraries to facilitate seamless data and asset transfer.
  • Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure reliable and secure interoperability.

Protocol Analysis & Design:

  • Analyze existing blockchain protocols and identify opportunities for interoperability enhancements.
  • Contribute to the design and implementation of new protocols and standards for interchain communication.
  • Stay abreast of emerging trends and advancements in blockchain interoperability.

Collaboration & Communication:

  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, product managers, and researchers.
  • Effectively communicate technical concepts and solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Participate in open-source communities and contribute to the advancement of blockchain interoperability.
about_company:
About Mysten Labs

Mysten Labs is a pioneering force in the decentralized web3 space. As a remote-first company, we empower talented individuals worldwide to contribute to building the future of the internet.

Driven by a mission to create foundational infrastructure for decentralized protocols, Mysten Labs is developing cutting-edge blockchain technologies. Backed by a substantial $300M Series B funding round from leading Silicon Valley venture capitalists, we are poised for rapid growth and expansion.

Join our team and be part of a dynamic environment where innovation thrives and your contributions directly impact the evolution of web3, bringing the next billion users into this exciting new era.
selection_process:
Mysten Labs - Systems Engineer (Interop Team) Hiring Workflow

1. Application Review: Candidates submit resumes and cover letters. The AI agent filters applications based on required skills and experience, prioritizing those with 5+ years of software engineering experience in systems languages like Rust or C++.

2. Technical Screening: Shortlisted candidates complete a coding challenge focused on distributed systems, networking, or security. The AI agent evaluates code quality, problem-solving approach, and adherence to best practices.

3. Interview Rounds: Top performers participate in a series of interviews:

  • Initial Interview: A behavioral interview with a recruiter to assess cultural fit and communication skills.
  • Technical Interview: A deep dive into technical expertise with a senior engineer, focusing on system design, cryptography, and secure system development.
  • Team Interview: A meeting with the interop team to discuss project specifics, collaboration style, and alignment with team goals.

4. Final Decision: The hiring manager makes the final decision based on the candidate's technical skills, experience, cultural fit, and interview performance.

5. Offer & Onboarding: A competitive offer is extended to the selected candidate, followed by a smooth onboarding process.

about_company:
About Gametime

Gametime believes live experiences bridge the digital divide and foster genuine human connection. We're a passionate team dedicated to making it easier for people to discover and enjoy unforgettable moments, right now.

Our platform connects users with a wide range of live events, from concerts and sporting events to theater performances and local happenings. We strive to create a seamless and intuitive experience, empowering users to find the perfect event and share it with friends and family.

At Gametime, we're driven by a mission to unite the world through shared experiences, one unforgettable moment at a time.
selection_process:
Gametime - Senior Backend Engineer II Hiring Workflow

job_description:
Infrastructure Engineer - Remote

About Inngest

Inngest is revolutionizing developer workflows by tackling persistent challenges in queueing, event-driven systems, and step functions. We're building innovative, first-of-its-kind solutions that empower developers to build more efficient and scalable applications.

Job Description

As an Infrastructure Engineer, you'll play a vital role in building and maintaining the robust infrastructure that powers Inngest's platform. You'll collaborate with our engineering team to design, implement, and optimize our cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability, scalability, and security.

Responsibilities

  • Design, build, and maintain cloud infrastructure using leading technologies.
  • Automate infrastructure provisioning and management processes.
  • Monitor system performance and implement proactive measures to ensure stability.
  • Collaborate with developers to troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure-related issues.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging cloud technologies and best practices.

Qualifications

  • Proven experience in designing and managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
  • Strong understanding of networking, security, and storage concepts.
  • Experience with infrastructure automation tools (Terraform, Ansible, etc.).
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

System Design & Implementation:

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure for Inngest's cloud-based platform.
  • Implement and manage infrastructure as code (IaC) solutions using tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.
  • Contribute to the development and maintenance of system architecture diagrams and documentation.

Operational Excellence:

  • Monitor system performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement solutions to ensure optimal uptime and efficiency.
  • Develop and implement automation scripts for routine infrastructure tasks.
  • Respond to and resolve infrastructure incidents promptly and effectively.

Security & Compliance:

  • Implement and maintain security best practices across the infrastructure.
  • Ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations.
  • Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
about_company:
About Inngest

Inngest is revolutionizing the way developers build and manage complex systems. We tackle long-standing challenges in queueing, event-driven architectures, and step functions, crafting innovative solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible.

Our team is passionate about building reliable, scalable, and developer-friendly infrastructure. We believe in empowering developers to focus on what matters most: creating exceptional user experiences. At Inngest, you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technology, collaborate with brilliant minds, and make a real impact on the future of software development.
selection_process:

1. Application Review: Candidates submit resumes and cover letters through the job portal. The AI agent automatically screens applications based on keywords, qualifications, and experience.

2. Skills Assessment: Shortlisted candidates complete a technical assessment testing their knowledge of cloud infrastructure, automation tools, and relevant programming languages.

3. Phone Screening: Top performers from the skills assessment participate in a phone interview with a recruiter to discuss their experience, motivations, and fit within Inngest's culture.

4. Technical Interview: Candidates selected after the phone screening engage in a technical interview with an Inngest engineer, delving deeper into their technical skills and problem-solving abilities.

5. Culture Fit Interview: Finalists participate in a culture fit interview with a member of the leadership team to assess their alignment with Inngest's values and work environment.

6. Offer & Onboarding: Successful candidates receive a job offer and embark on a comprehensive onboarding process to integrate seamlessly into the Inngest team.

job_description:
Software Engineer (Contractor) - Global Remote

About Jump

Jump is a revenue-backed, rapidly growing company headquartered in SLC, Utah. We recently raised a $20M Series-A and are looking for talented individuals to join our team. We offer a global remote work environment.

Job Description

We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our team on a contract basis. You will be responsible for building software applications using Elixir, Liveview, Postgres, and other technologies within our tech stack. This role involves collaborating with a small, efficient development team to deliver a complete, deployed, and functional application that meets all project requirements.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop software applications using Elixir, Liveview, Postgres, and other relevant technologies.
  • Collaborate effectively with a small development team.
  • Design, develop, and deploy a complete application solution.
  • Ensure all project requirements are met.

Qualifications:

  • Proficiency in Elixir, Liveview, and Postgres.
  • Experience with other technologies in our tech stack.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
  • Familiarity with AI tools (e.g., Cursor.ai, ChatGPT) is a plus.

Compensation:

  • $30-$70/hour depending on experience.
  • Opportunity to earn an additional $3,000 for completing a paid project challenge.

Hiring Process:

  • 3-step process: screening test, paid project challenge, and final chat with CTO.
  • Approximately 1-week hiring process.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Software Development: Design, develop, and implement new features and functionalities for Jump's software applications using Elixir, Liveview, Postgres, and other specified technologies.
  • Project Execution: Lead the development of a complete, deployed, and functional application from conception to completion, ensuring all requirements are met.
  • Team Collaboration: Effectively communicate and collaborate with a small, agile development team to achieve project goals and maintain code quality.
  • Problem Solving: Identify and resolve technical challenges independently and collaboratively, demonstrating strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Documentation: Contribute to clear and concise documentation for developed code and features, ensuring maintainability and understanding by other team members.

job_description:
Mental Health Therapist - Virtual Care

About Included Health

Included Health is revolutionizing healthcare by delivering integrated virtual care and navigation. We are dedicated to providing high-quality, accessible care to diverse populations across the country.

About the Role

We are seeking experienced and passionate Licensed Mental Health Therapists to join our growing virtual care team. This is a general interest posting. By applying, you will be considered for future openings aligned with your licensure, specialty, and availability.

Responsibilities

  • Provide high-quality, evidence-based mental health therapy to patients via telehealth platforms.
  • Conduct comprehensive assessments and develop individualized treatment plans.
  • Facilitate individual, group, and family therapy sessions.
  • Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to ensure comprehensive patient care.
  • Maintain accurate and timely documentation of patient interactions.

Qualifications

  • Licensed Mental Health Therapist (LMFT, LCSW, LPC, or equivalent) in good standing.
  • Demonstrated experience providing individual and group therapy.
  • Strong clinical skills and knowledge of evidence-based treatment modalities.
  • Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
  • Proficiency with telehealth platforms and electronic health records.

Compensation

$61.25 - $61.25 per hour

To Apply

Submit your information to be considered for future roles.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Provide high-quality, evidence-based individual and group therapy to clients via telehealth platform.
  • Conduct comprehensive assessments to determine client needs and develop individualized treatment plans.
  • Effectively utilize therapeutic modalities tailored to client demographics and presenting concerns.
  • Maintain accurate and timely documentation of client sessions and progress notes in accordance with HIPAA regulations.
  • Collaborate with multidisciplinary team members to ensure holistic client care.
  • Participate in ongoing professional development to enhance clinical skills and knowledge.
  • Adhere to ethical guidelines and standards of practice as outlined by licensing board.
  • Demonstrate strong communication, empathy, and cultural sensitivity in all client interactions.

job_description:
Heavy Maintenance Representative

About Allegiant Air

Allegiant Air is a national air carrier and essential service provider during declared emergencies. We value diversity and encourage applications from individuals with varied backgrounds and experiences.

Job Summary

Allegiant Air is seeking a highly experienced Heavy Maintenance Representative to oversee and manage heavy maintenance, modification, and repair activities performed by external vendors. This role ensures all work adheres to the highest safety and quality standards, is completed on time and within budget, and complies with all regulatory requirements.

Key Responsibilities

  • Supervise and coordinate heavy maintenance activities performed by outside vendors.
  • Ensure all maintenance work meets safety, quality, and budgetary standards.
  • Collaborate with internal departments to resolve issues impacting aircraft delivery schedules.
  • Manage vendor performance reporting and ensure adherence to contractual and budgetary obligations.
  • Authorize non-routine maintenance costs and review vendor invoices.
  • Verify, audit, and monitor regulatory documents to ensure compliance.

Qualifications

  • Airframe and Powerplant (A&P) License required.
  • Minimum 10 years of experience in Part 121 or Part 135/transport category aircraft maintenance or as a Quality Inspector.
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in heavy maintenance of Part 121 heavy transport category aircraft or equivalent.
  • Ability to interpret and understand aircraft maintenance manuals and related documentation.
  • Proficiency in basic computer skills and the use of precision measuring equipment.
  • Excellent interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Oversee Heavy Maintenance Operations: Supervise and coordinate all heavy maintenance, modification, and repair activities performed by external vendors.
  • Ensure Quality and Compliance: Guarantee that all maintenance adheres to the highest safety and quality standards, regulatory requirements, and contractual obligations.
  • Manage Vendor Performance: Monitor and report on the performance of service providers, ensuring work is completed on time, within budget, and to contractual specifications.
  • Financial Oversight: Approve non-routine maintenance costs and review vendor invoices for accuracy.
  • Communication and Collaboration: Effectively communicate with internal departments to resolve issues impacting aircraft maintenance schedules and delivery.
about_company:
About Allegiant Air

Allegiant Air is a national air carrier committed to providing affordable travel options to leisure destinations across the United States. As an essential service provider, Allegiant plays a vital role in connecting people with their loved ones and enriching their lives through travel.

The company prides itself on its dedication to safety, operational efficiency, and exceptional customer service. Allegiant fosters a diverse and inclusive work environment where individuals from all backgrounds are valued and encouraged to contribute their unique talents.

2. Phone Screening: HR representatives conduct brief phone interviews to assess basic qualifications and cultural fit.

3. Skills Assessment: Candidates complete a technical assessment evaluating their knowledge of airframe and powerplant systems, maintenance procedures, and regulatory compliance.

4. In-Person Interview: Shortlisted candidates participate in a panel interview with hiring managers and team members, focusing on experience, problem-solving abilities, and leadership qualities.

5. Reference Checks: HR verifies candidate references and employment history.

6. Final Decision: Hiring managers make a final decision based on the candidate's qualifications, interview performance, and reference checks.

7. Offer & Onboarding: A competitive offer is extended to the selected candidate, followed by a comprehensive onboarding process.

job_description:
Freelance Screenshot Collector - Chinese

About DataForce by TransPerfect

DataForce by TransPerfect, part of the world's largest provider of language and technology solutions, delivers high-quality data for Human-Machine Interaction to leading technology companies globally.

Job Description

We are seeking detail-oriented and independent freelance screenshot collectors proficient in Chinese (Traditional and/or Simplified) to capture screenshots of publicly accessible websites and applications.

Responsibilities:

  • Capture high-quality screenshots using iPhone, MacBook, or iPad, focusing on Chinese content.
  • Accurately annotate each screenshot with categorization, description, and link/app name, adhering to predefined guidelines.
  • Maintain consistent accuracy and quality throughout the process.

Requirements:

  • Fluency in reading Chinese (Traditional and/or Simplified).
  • Access to iPhone 12 or later, iPad running iPadOS 18 or later, or Mac computer running macOS 15.0 (Sequoia) or later.
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to follow specific instructions.
  • Proven ability to work independently and meet performance targets.
  • Excellent organizational skills for managing multiple screenshots and metadata.

Compensation:

  • $0.5 USD per accepted screenshot.
  • Estimated hourly throughput: 30 screenshots.
  • Preferred availability: Minimum 10 hours per week.

If you are a meticulous individual with a passion for detail and a strong command of Chinese, we encourage you to apply.
key_responsibility:
Key Responsibilities

  • Capture Screenshots: Take high-quality screenshots of publicly accessible Chinese websites and applications using an iPhone, MacBook, or iPad.
  • Content Focus: Ensure screenshots primarily feature Chinese content and align with predefined guidelines and categorization criteria.
  • Metadata Annotation: Accurately annotate each screenshot with relevant information, including categorization, a brief description, and the link/app name.
  • Quality Assurance: Maintain a high standard of accuracy and consistency in all captured screenshots and annotations.
  • Time Management: Effectively manage time to meet established performance targets and deliver screenshots within agreed-upon deadlines.
about_company:
About TransPerfect

TransPerfect is the world's largest provider of language and technology solutions for global business. With a global network of offices and a team of over 9000 employees, TransPerfect delivers high-quality language services, technology solutions, and data solutions to clients around the world.

DataForce by TransPerfect is a specialized division focused on providing high-quality data for Human-Machine Interaction to prestigious technology companies worldwide. DataForce leverages cutting-edge technology and a global workforce to deliver accurate, reliable, and scalable data solutions that empower businesses to innovate and succeed in the global marketplace.
